description: This file defines a performance evaluation setup for creating and running a language graph agent using LangChain and LangGraph libraries. It includes a weather tool, an agent instantiation function, and runs the evaluation with specified iterations.

methods.name: get_weather
methods.description: A tool function to get weather information for specified cities ('nyc' or 'sf').

methods.name: instantiate_agent
methods.description: Creates a react agent using the ChatOpenAI model and the weather tool.
